title: Larry Kosilla (AMMONYC)
description:
Larry Kosilla is one of the world’s best detailers and the founder of AMMO NYC detailing products. On this episode we talk paint protection, car care for lazy people, his new product (and EPA headache), washing cars in the winter, supply chains, shipping costs, his new EV, his insane 9 hour commute. 

 @AMMO NYC 

https://www.ammonyc.com

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals, including free shipping.

Go to StatHero.com/SMOKINGTIRE, sign up for free and you can get three times back on your first play.

Want our sunglasses AND a free t-shirt? Go to https://thesmokingtire.com/partners-1 and click on the Dillon banner.

Want early access to this episode? To watch the live stream? Get bonus content? Join our Patreon! Pro Driver patrons had access to this episode on 09/2/2021 Go to  https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast and check out the tiers. It all starts at just $3/month!
